import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../product"; //to get id from url we are using useParams() const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productID } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productID.toString()); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} Status: ${product.countInStock > 0 ? `In Stock` : `Out of Stock`}
